attributes.title: absolutely repulsive
attributes.review: First of all, this app took weeks to download, which is completely unacceptable! Wouldn’t work no matter what i tried; when i opened it, all i saw was a black screen with the words “b u n k e r b o y” written on it. What’s this supposed to mean?! I am outraged at all the disruption this stupid app has caused in my life and do not recommended it to anyone.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: The app constantly glitches on me and is more and more vigorously each time taking my battery away like crazy!! Every time that I go into the app my location turns on without giving it permission to, and not only my location but also my microphone, anything that invades into my privacy THIS app turns on.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!
attributes.review: This app is everything you’re looking for. It has racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia. I couldn’t be happier!! But when it started being racist against white people, that’s when I had a problem. It called me a Karen!! That is a HATE CRIME!!!!! I will not be supporting our once wonderful president trump in the future election. It turned me from a conservative republican to a liberal.

attributes.title: Delete this app!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my president and to make America great again unfortunately when I downloaded it and opened the app my whole phone crashed and all my pictures apps and phone numbers got deleted. I think this app is terrible and should get deleted immediately

attributes.title: Disappointing
attributes.review: Absolutely disappointed with this app. It crashed multiple times and redirected me to the donations page. I’m broke af. The app also took too long to download. I waited two weeks for the app to finish downloading but for some reason when I opened the app I saw a Cheeto on the front page. 🤔Wait this is not the Obama app?

attributes.title: very bad. not good.🤮😈👺❌
attributes.review: this app is despicable! it is awful, or shall i say, dReAdFuL! this app should be taken down. it is very inconvenient considering this man is not likable whatsoever, and having an app to promote himself just really doesn’t do much good. this app is cAnCeLlEd😌✨🧚🏼‍♂️💅🌝this app deserves to be put in a casket, buried, and then be eaten by worms, snakes, and roaches, along with trump. this app is truly disgraceful. thank you and goodbye.💅✨🌝💅✨🌝💅✨🌝💅✨

attributes.title: Bad president
attributes.review: I truly think that America is bad Because of him tb sum “let’s make America great again” he the one making it worst notice how it’s his last year of being president I bet he made corona el kill people because the population. He’s psycho and he doesn’t deserve to be president. I hope trump gets kidnapped and trips on his face. Don’t try to get the fbi on me now😔🤚🏽.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review:
If I could give this app 0 stars I would. I think it’s absolutely disgusting that we allow apps like this on the app store! There are children who can access this app! My child downloaded it and had nightmares for weeks!! He was afraid that the big scary orange man was going to hurt him! Please take this app down or I will call your manager!

-Barron

attributes.title: Glitchy and crashes
attributes.review: I got the app to have a list of my presidents events but it kept asking for my location. As soon as I accepted, the app started glitching and crashing. Not to mention so many pop ups trying to send push notifications. I no that no means yes sometimes but leave me alone already.

attributes.title: WORST APP & IT HACKED ME
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to catch up on the news. but then it all went downhill. when i tried to make a login it kept crashing and when it worked, i got signed up for SEVERAL DIFFERENT email chains- not Trumps. It continued to crash and use my data which was NOWHERE IN THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS. this was such a scam and the WORST APP IVE EVER DOWNLOADED. and i’m still getting strange emails today.
